name: KitchenScale
0:
”Alexa, ask Kitchen Scale the weight of two pints of milk”
”Alexa, ask Kitchen Scale for three quarters cup sugar”
”Alexa, ask Kitchen Scale about four tablespoons of honey”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kitchen scale
des: When cooking, weights are more accurate than volumes. But most recipes are still written in cups. Use this skill to translate cups and other units of volume, to ounces or grams.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
